alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 25 at 4:19PM PST until March 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, except 8 to 16 inches above 5000 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Now is the time to prepare an emergency kit for your home and car. If traveling consider alternate plans, remember to carry tire chains, extra food, water and clothing. Once the storm arrives, travel may be difficult or impossible for an extended period of time.
